name: annulment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an official announcement that something such as a law, agreement, or marriage no longer exists, or the process of making this announcement: Judges only grant marriage annulments in exceptional circumstances. The discovery of the election fraud has led to the annulment of 50,000 votes. See
annul
More examplesFewer examplesHer lawyer filed for annulment.Their short marriage ended in divorce, but now they were both seeking a church annulment.He came to power following the military's controversial annulment of the presidential election.
